publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4532 Marilyn Livingstone: Fife Shopmobility Services—That the Parliament welcomes the opening of the new premises of Fife Shopmobility in Kirkcaldy; commends the work of Fife Shopmobility in providing wheelchairs and scooters to enable people with mobility difficulties and visual impairments to access shopping and leisure facilities in the town centre; acknowledges the work and dedication of volunteers who provide a companion shopping service and are trained in customer care and sighted guidance for many of the 1,864 registered users who require assistance while shopping, and recognises that for the past 18 years the charity has helped people to gain independence, self-esteem and choice and that the services are helping to meet the goals of social inclusion and equality in the local community as well as contributing to the town’s economy.
S3M-4532 Fife Shopmobility Services (lodged on 26 June 2009) Karen Whitefield*
